casinoInfo.title: Top gaming venue in Birmingham
casinoInfo.name: Resorts World Casino
features: A haven casino with over +100 games
Outdoor terrace with amazing views to Pendigo Lake
Boasting its signature casino’s Sports Bar
Smart casual is welcome as dress code
Guaranteed a warm and friendly service

descriptions.mainDescription: Ideally located just minutes from Birmingham’s Airport, the Resorts World Casino is considered a slot machine haven with over 100 slot machines, and one of the largest casinos in the UK. It is simply your best option for your gaming entertainment and a memorable night out in Birmingham.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: Those looking for gaming action the Resorts World Casino is full with live table games like roulette, blackjack, poker and more. Boasting mouth-watering steaks, grazing plates and international dishes. Including a lively Sports Bar with mouth watering dishes, a sports café and bustling bar to sip fresh drinks.

casinoInfo.standOut: Amazing views & plenty of casino games

casinoInfo.title: Top gaming venue in Hurst Street
casinoInfo.name: Genting Casino Birmingham Chinatown
features: Offering a double-story venue full of casino games
Boasting the best Chinese restaurant in town
A late bar is included to relax and enjoy drinks
Hosting monthly special events for your entertainment
A special VIP gaming area is available

descriptions.mainDescription: At Genting Casino Birmingham Chinatown you will find plenty of table games, electronic table games, slot machines, and progressive jackpot machines. The double-story building houses a restaurant and two separate gaming areas. There is no shortage of food and drink here. Genting's Imperial Kitchen is an authentic Chinese restaurant open 7 days a week.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: In their VIP section, you will be able to enjoy a more luxurious gaming experience with reclining seats that have buttons in their armrests for ease of play. Not only are the chairs comfortable, but the games feature two ultra HD 32-inch screens to provide even better quality. In addition to their restaurant, while in the gaming area you can make use of their Late Bar.

casinoInfo.title: Top gaming venue in Broad Street
casinoInfo.name: Grosvenor Casino Birmingham
features: Boasting over +60 casino games
Including a mid-size poker room
Offering tutorial tables for beginners
Its Gallery Restaurant serves tasty food
Live entertainment available on weekends

descriptions.mainDescription: Despite being spoilt for choice when it comes to casinos in Birmingham, the Broad Street Grosvenor Casino is up there with the best of them, offering quality games, food and entertainment. Including an impressive range of table games, a vast selection of slots and electronic roulette tables and a medium-sized poker room.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: Open 24 hours a day and seven days a week, this casino can be found in the Fiveways Leisure Complex on Broad Street in the centre of Birmingham. As well as a multitude of gaming options, guests will also be able to enjoy a full-service restaurant and a sports bar that will provide plenty of entertainment options throughout the week.

casinoInfo.title: Top landmark casino in Birmingham
casinoInfo.name: Rainbow Casino
features: Established ever since 1962
Offering a comfortable poker room
Including over 30 live casino tables and slot machines
Boasting a comprehensive menu of food & drinks
Monthly live entertainment is available

descriptions.mainDescription: The Rainbow Casino is Birmingham's entertaining staple as it was the first gaming venue the city ever had. Located minutes away from Birmingham's centre, offering slot machines, Touchbet roulette, Texas hold'em, and more. Its Clarendon Restaurant has a tasty menu that includes exclusive dishes such as 21-day aged steaks, custom-built burgers, spicey curries, healthy salads and more.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: Enjoy lively nights and special monthly events, where you can come along with your friends to sip your favourite drinks from coffee to the most stylish cocktails or classic beer. Including large televisions that you can use to catch the latest live sporting events, along with an eclectic choice of alcoholic drinks that will surely spice up your visit to the Rainbow Casino.

casinoInfo.title: Top casino in the West Bromwich area
casinoInfo.name: Shaftesbury Casino
features: Offering all the high stakes table games
Boasting a comprehensive dining experience
Fine dining curated by Chef Jenson in a crystal restaurant
Including a heated outdoor terrace
Hosting monthly special parties and events

descriptions.mainDescription: The Met Casino is a jewel in the heart of Mayfair for those who appreciate the extraordinary in gaming and dining experiences. Guests can enjoy thrills with a touch of sophistication at its elegant blackjack tables or its luxury roulette wheels, for the Met Mayfair boasts unique services for the discerning player.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: The Metropolitan Mayfair's internationally inspired menu serves guests the most exclusive dishes curated by Chef Jenson. Including an exclusive outdoor, heated Terrace where you can take a break from the bustle of the main gaming floor to breathe fresh air, play Roulette, and relax with a drink.

casinoInfo.standOut: Off-centre area location & great food and drinks

casinoInfo.title: Top Bingo venue in Birmingham
casinoInfo.name: Mecca Acocks Green
features: Ideally located at one of London's landmark streets
World-class classic casino games available
Hosting monthly special themed nights
Membership is required
Boasting the finest international dishes

descriptions.mainDescription: Mecca Bingo Acocks Green is not just the home of great bingo games and slot machines, there is live entertainment, tasty food and great value drinks, all wrapped up in one venue. Combining traditional bingo with the latest touchscreen technology making it easy and fun to play. Join for a lively night out with weekly special events.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: You can enjoy a selection of food and drinks in its large, gaming venue. Mecca's slots area holds the most popular and up to date games in town. Enjoy its tasty menu along with your gameplay, including tasty classics like chicken burgers, tikka curry, their fabulous loaded fries range and chip shop classics.

casinoInfo.title: Top Slots venue in the Erdington Area
casinoInfo.name: Merkur Slots
features: Boasting a wide array of slot machines
Including all time classics as the latest titles
Warm and helpful staff to serve you
Unlimited free refreshments are included
Smart casual is widely welcome here

descriptions.mainDescription: If you fancy some slot machine thrills, then you have to go to Merkur Slots Erdington and spin the latest titles in the venue specializing in electronic gaming, and earn the chance to walk away with a nice jackpot. Offering complimentary hot food and premium drinks with unlimited free refreshments.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: As long as guests are legally aged to visit the venue, Merkur does not require membership to enjoy its slot machines haven. And if you are a beginner, Merkur Slots' trained, helpful staff are more than glad to teach you to play. On top of this everyone who plays in Erdington's venue is entitled to unlimited free refreshments.
